verses.verse: And the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, saying, <S%H559><s%>

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> set <S%H7760><s%> thy face <S%H6440><s%> toward <S%H413><s%> the mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and prophesy <S%H5012><s%> against <S%H413><s%> them,

And say, <S%H559><s%> Ye mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> hear <S%H8085><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%> to the mountains, <S%H2022><s%> and to the hills, <S%H1389><s%> to the rivers, <S%H650><s%> and to the valleys; <S%H1516><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I, even I, <S%H589><s%> will bring <S%H935><s%> a sword <S%H2719><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> you, and I will destroy <S%H6><s%> your high places. <S%H1116><s%>

And your altars <S%H4196><s%> shall be desolate, <S%H8074><s%> and your images <S%H2553><s%> shall be broken: <S%H7665><s%> and I will cast down <S%H5307><s%> your slain <S%H2491><s%> men before <S%H6440><s%> your idols. <S%H1544><s%>

And I will lay <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> the dead carcasses <S%H6297><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> their idols; <S%H1544><s%> and I will scatter <S%H2219><s%> <S%H853><s%> your bones <S%H6106><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%> your altars. <S%H4196><s%>

In all <S%H3605><s%> your dwelling places <S%H4186><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> shall be laid waste, <S%H2717><s%> and the high places <S%H1116><s%> shall be desolate; <S%H3456><s%> that <S%H4616><s%> your altars <S%H4196><s%> may be laid waste <S%H2717><s%> and made desolate, <S%H816><s%> and your idols <S%H1544><s%> may be broken <S%H7665><s%> and cease, <S%H7673><s%> and your images <S%H2553><s%> may be cut down, <S%H1438><s%> and your works <S%H4639><s%> may be abolished. <S%H4229><s%>
And the slain <S%H2491><s%> shall fall <S%H5307><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of you, and ye shall know <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

Yet will I leave a remnant, <S%H3498><s%> that ye may have <S%H1961><s%> some that shall escape <S%H6412><s%> the sword <S%H2719><s%> among the nations, <S%H1471><s%> when ye shall be scattered <S%H2219><s%> through the countries. <S%H776><s%>

And they that escape <S%H6412><s%> of you shall remember <S%H2142><s%> me among the nations <S%H1471><s%> whither <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> they shall be carried captives, <S%H7617><s%> because <S%H834><s%> I am broken <S%H7665><s%> with <S%H854><s%> their whorish <S%H2181><s%> heart, <S%H3820><s%> which <S%H834><s%> hath departed <S%H5493><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> me, and with <S%H854><s%> their eyes, <S%H5869><s%> which go a whoring <S%H2181><s%> after <S%H310><s%> their idols: <S%H1544><s%> and they shall loathe <S%H6962><s%> themselves <S%H6440><s%> for <S%H413><s%> the evils <S%H7451><s%> which <S%H834><s%> they have committed <S%H6213><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> their abominations. <S%H8441><s%>

And they shall know <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and that I have not <S%H3808><s%> said <S%H1696><s%> in vain <S%H413><s%> <S%H2600><s%> that I would do <S%H6213><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> unto them.

Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> Smite <S%H5221><s%> with thine hand, <S%H3709><s%> and stamp <S%H7554><s%> with thy foot, <S%H7272><s%> and say, <S%H559><s%> Alas <S%H253><s%> for <S%H413><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the evil <S%H7451><s%> abominations <S%H8441><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel! <S%H3478><s%> for <S%H834><s%> they shall fall <S%H5307><s%> by the sword, <S%H2719><s%> by the famine, <S%H7458><s%> and by the pestilence. <S%H1698><s%>

He that is far off <S%H7350><s%> shall die <S%H4191><s%> of the pestilence; <S%H1698><s%> and he that is near <S%H7138><s%> shall fall <S%H5307><s%> by the sword; <S%H2719><s%> and he that remaineth <S%H7604><s%> and is besieged <S%H5341><s%> shall die <S%H4191><s%> by the famine: <S%H7458><s%> thus will I accomplish <S%H3615><s%> my fury <S%H2534><s%> upon them.

Then shall ye know <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> when their slain <S%H2491><s%> men shall be <S%H1961><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> their idols <S%H1544><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%> their altars, <S%H4196><s%> upon <S%H413><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> high <S%H7311><s%> hill, <S%H1389><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> the tops <S%H7218><s%> of the mountains, <S%H2022><s%> and under <S%H8478><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> green <S%H7488><s%> tree, <S%H6086><s%> and under <S%H8478><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> thick <S%H5687><s%> oak, <S%H424><s%> the place <S%H4725><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> they did offer <S%H5414><s%> sweet <S%H5207><s%> savor <S%H7381><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> their idols. <S%H1544><s%>

So will I stretch out <S%H5186><s%> <S%H853><s%> my hand <S%H3027><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> them, and make <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> desolate, <S%H8077><s%> yea, more desolate <S%H4923><s%> than the wilderness <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4057><s%> toward Diblath, <S%H1689><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> their habitations: <S%H4186><s%> and they shall know <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
